description: This file defines a utility function 'detectSource' that analyzes a URL string and categorizes it as 'reddit', 'x', 'youtube', or 'web' based on the hostname. It provides a simple way to identify the source platform of a given URL.

methods.name: export function detectSource(url: string): 'reddit' | 'x' | 'youtube' | 'web' { detectSource
methods.description: Analyzes a URL string and returns a string indicating the source platform ('reddit', 'x', 'youtube', or 'web') based on hostname.
